Title: Halkaa
Writer: Nitin Dixit (dialogue), Nitin Dixit (screenplay), Nitin Dixit (story), Protiqe Mojoomdar (lyricist), Nila Madhab Panda (story)
Actors: Paoli Dam, Vipin Katyal, Ranvir Shorey, Tathastu
Plot: Halkaa (Relief) is a unique take on a slum child's heroism, aspirations and dreams. The child protagonist, Pichku fights for the basic problem that he faces everyday; defecating in the open among others.
